localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Garland
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 2302 Northwest Highway, Suite 110, near Firewheel Town Center and Hawaiian Falls waterpark. If you are taking I-30, take Exit 56 (Northwest Highway) and head east. From I-635 (LBJ Freeway), take Exit 11 (Garland Road) and head north to Northwest Highway.

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Payday Loan Laws in Texas
stateCompliance.content: Garland residents should understand that payday loans are legal in Texas through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs). While Texas has minimal state-level restrictions, Garland has a local ordinance that provides additional consumer protections.
keyPoints: Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs) regulated by the OCCC
There is no state cap on interest rates or CAB fees - typical APRs range from 400% to 700%+
You have the right to cancel your loan within 3 days of signing without penalty
Lenders cannot threaten criminal prosecution for non-payment (except for fraud or theft)
Your wages cannot be garnished for payday loan debt under Texas law
Your home (if declared homestead) is protected from debt collection
Always verify your lender is licensed at occc.texas.gov before borrowing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC)

warningBox.title: Important Cost Warning
warningBox.content: Payday loans in Texas are among the most expensive in the nation. A typical $300 loan can cost over $1,000 in fees alone, resulting in APRs exceeding 700%. Consider alternatives such as credit union loans, payment plans with creditors, or nonprofit credit counseling before taking out a payday loan.

stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal advice. Payday loan laws and regulations change frequently. The information presented may not reflect the most current legal developments. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, contact the Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner at (800) 538-1579 or visit occc.texas.gov. If you need legal advice, please consult with a licensed attorney in Texas.

cityOrdinance.headline: Garland Local Payday Loan Ordinance
cityOrdinance.summary: The City of Garland has adopted a local ordinance providing additional consumer protections for payday loan borrowers.
keyProvisions: Payday loans are limited to 20% of the borrower's gross monthly income
Maximum of 3 rollovers or renewals allowed
Each rollover/renewal must reduce the principal by at least 25%
CABs must register with the City of Garland
cityOrdinance.source: City of Garland Code of Ordinances

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Garland location? We also serve these nearby communities:

faq.question: Where is your Garland location?
faq.answer: Our Garland branch is located at 2302 Northwest Highway, Suite 110, near Firewheel Town Center. Take I-30 Exit 56 (Northwest Highway) and head east, or I-635 Exit 11 (Garland Road) and head north.

faq.question: What are your hours in Garland?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 7 PM, and Saturday from 10 AM to 4 PM. We're closed on Sundays. You can also apply online 24/7.

faq.question: Does Garland have local payday loan ordinances?
faq.answer: Yes, Garland has a local ordinance that limits payday loans to 20% of your gross monthly income, allows a maximum of 3 rollovers, and requires each rollover to reduce the principal by 25%. These rules help protect consumers.

faq.question: How does the Garland ordinance affect my loan?
faq.answer: The ordinance limits how much you can borrow based on your income and restricts rollovers. We'll explain exactly how this applies to your situation during the application process.

faq.question: What documents do I need to bring?
faq.answer: Please bring a valid government-issued photo ID, proof of income (recent pay stub or bank statement showing gross income), proof of residence (utility bill or lease), and your bank account information for direct deposit.

faq.question: How quickly can I get cash in Garland?
faq.answer: If you apply in-store during business hours and are approved, you can receive cash the same day. For online applications approved by 6 PM CT, funds are typically deposited the next business day.
